Reviews.Title: Compact and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Michelle A. Allen
Reviews.Content: A fun little camera.  My husband took it to Yosemite and got some great shots.  Very compact and easy to use.  The bundle included everything we needed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powershot A2500 Red 16MP Digital Camera with 5x Opt. Zoom and Smart AUTO
16GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card
Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case - DP15
NB-11L Replacement Battery For PowerShot A2300,A2400,A3400,A4000,110HSE,320HSE
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot A2500 Red Digital Camera 16GB Bundle - Includes camera, 16GB SD Memory Card, Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, NB-11L Replacement Battery, Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, and 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
